corporateDescription: Welcome to MEKANIZMA A.≈û.! We are here to provide you with the best service. Post your job openings and connect with talented candidates.
howItWorksTitle: HOW DO WE RECEIVE APPLICATIONS WITH YOLLABI
step1Description: You can start your Yollabi membership by filling out the application form above. After your review is completed, you can start posting free job ads.
step2Description: You can easily publish your ad online in approximately 1 minute.
step3Description: Applications received for your ads will be sent to you via notifications and email. You can access candidate information from the applications page, review and approve them.
